biotools.summary: Suite of tools for data mining based on information from Gene Ontology (GO). Onto-Tools includes an annotation database and the data mining tools: Onto-Express, Onto-Compare, Onto-Design, Onto-Translate, Onto-Miner, Pathway-Express, Promoter-Express, nsSNPCounter, TAQ, and OE2GO; free registration is required.

bioschemas.name: Onto-Tools
